front.title: Update to the ipn URI scheme

abstract.t: This document updates the specification of the ipn URI scheme previously defined in RFC 6260, the IANA registries established in RFC 7116, and the rules for the encoding and decoding of these URIs when used as an Endpoint Identifier (EID) in Bundle Protocol Version 7 (BPv7) as defined in RFC 9171. These updates clarify the structure and behavior of the ipn URI scheme, define new encodings of ipn scheme URIs, and establish the registries necessary to manage this scheme.
